item.title: Introduction
item.description: In this class we will be reading several papers in the area of advanced networking. More specifically, we will be looking at papers in the following broad areas: Current Internet Model and the design decisions that led to the current TCP/IP model Autonomous systems and Border gateway protocol Domain name system and how contemporary applications use it Content Delivery Networks and Peer-to-Peer Networks Software Defined Networking Information Centric Networking There is no textbook for this course.
